sentence.Network_en: A classmate was chosen to act the part of Ceasar in the upcoming school play.
sentence.Network_cn: 在即将来临的学校戏剧表演中,一个同学被选中去演凯撒大帝.

sentence.Network_en: It is supposed to represent the Scales of Justice, held aloft by Julius Ceasar.
sentence.Network_cn: 它代表了公平, 被朱利叶斯高举着.

sentence.Network_en: It is supposed to represent the Scales of Justice aloft by Julius Ceasar.
sentence.Network_cn: 代表着公平的天秤,被凯撒大帝放置在最高处,警戒着人们.
